https://tmrev.io/movie/54120-Bastards of the Party 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kbmljC4VN32Z4uVBiigxlUD7i4U.jpg Surrounded by death and the brutal lifestyle that feeds it, a Los Angeles gangbanger explores the history of Southern California street gangs from the 1950s through the 1990s in an attempt to fully understand his existence. Bastards of the Party humanizes the staggering casualties of the LA gang wars. Bastards of the Party
